body.bibl: Childers, Jeff W. “‘You Have Found What You Seek’: The Form and Function of a Sixth-Century Divinatory Bible in Syriac.” In Snapshots of Evolving Traditions: Jewish and Christian Manuscript Culture, Textual Fluidity, and New Philology, edited by Liv Ingeborg Lied and Hugo Lundhaug, 242–71. Texte Und Untersuchungen Zur Geschichte Der Altchristlichen Literatur 175. Berlin: Walter de Gruyter, 2017.

Jeff W. Childers, ‘You Have Found What You Seek’: The Form and Function of a Sixth-Century Divinatory Bible in Syriac, in Snapshots of Evolving Traditions: Jewish and Christian Manuscript Culture, Textual Fluidity, and New Philology, ed.
